titles.title: To clarify the tariff classification of certain fiberboard core and laminate boards and panels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/3/2007--Introduced. Declares that Congress finds that the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States was amended on February 3, 2007, to provide that certain high-density fiberboard shall include laminate boards bonded in whole or in part, or impregnated, with synthetic resins. Applies such amendment retroactively to certain entries.
